titles.title: To fix rates of pay for Members of Congress at the levels which were in effect immediately before the enactment of the Ethics Reform Act of 1989.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to adjust the annual rate of pay for each Member of Congress to the rate payable as of November 29, 1989. Amends the Ethics Reform Act of 1989 to provide for continuation of provisions limiting outside income and employment and banning honoraria.
